title: Devotions or Devotion
description: Keith Green shares from a modified version of a sermon from one of Charles Finney's books. The insights from this sermon are very unique and its well worth the listen. It's not necessarily the things we do that please God, but the reasons why we do them. A beautiful look at true devotion.

title: Dying to Self (Part 1 of 2)
description: In this age of self-seeking and comfortable living, Keith shows that dying to self is not an option in the Christian life - it is the Christian life! A must for every Christian seeking to draw closer to God. Self-Denial is one of the most neglected themes of scriptural teaching in our day but it is crucial for salvation to experience this truth.

title: Dying to Self (Part 2 of 2)
description: In this age of self-seeking and comfortable living, Keith shows that dying to self is not an option in the Christian life - it is the Christian life! A must for every Christian seeking to draw closer to God. Self-Denial is one of the most neglected themes of scriptural teaching in our day but it is crucial for salvation to experience this truth.

title: Error of Balaam - Part 1
description: If God speaks firmly once, it is best not to ask Him again and test His Spirit.  This message deals with honesty in heart and obedience to the Voice of God.

title: Error of Balamm - Part 2
description: If God speaks firmly once, it is best not to ask Him again and test His Spirit.  This message deals with honesty in heart and obedience to the Voice of God.

title: Grumbling and Complaining - Part 1
description: Is the journey to the Promised Land causing your endurance to wear thin?Before you start longing for Egypt, you should know there are lessons that only the wilderness can teach?

title: Grumbling and Complaining - Part 2
description: Is the journey to the Promised Land causing your endurance to wear thin?Before you start longing for Egypt, you should know there are lessons that only the wilderness can teach?

title: Make My Life a Prayer to You
description: This is a short exhoration given by brother Green. He shares and reads an excerpt from the book "The Revival We Need" by Oswald J. Smith which really makes a powerful point.

title: The Man Behind the Message
description: Keith shares about his early experiences as a new Christian and his struggles at being labeled "a prophet." This message leaves no room for excusing ourselves of any sin under the guise of a "special calling."

title: Whats wrong with the gospel - Part 1
description: This message deals with false ideals and expectations that many professing Christian's have about God. It is an awesome message and a great challenge and encouragement to all believers to walk in the Light of the Word. Keith gives a pointed listing of the "traditions of men" that have somehow become deeply ingrained in today's message but bear no resemblance to what Jesus actually taught.
